Articles.Content:
Hey there, 

I have recently been recieveing multiple crashes whilst trying to build in the VAB, as when i am moving items around, windows alerts me that a crash has happened and that it will alert me if it finds a solution.

Thanks,

Bullseye2030

http://en.file-upload.net/download-11536924/output_log.txt.html

Edited May 1, 2016 by Bullseye2030
Attempted to add crash log.

Hi @Bullseye2030, the cause of this crash is not yet know, but I do know that KSP can become unstable when other software is using hooks to monitor memory.

One example of this is EVGA's PrecisionX 16 overclocking software.

While I do not see that in your log I see that AVG anti-virus is using hooks, please test KSP with AVG disabled to see if this is a factor, thank you.

Quote

C:\Program Files (x86)\AVG\Av\avghookx.dll:avghookx.dll (73A00000), size: 184320 (result: 0), SymType: '-nosymbols-', PDB: 'C:\Program Files (x86)\AVG\Av\avghookx.dll', fileVersion: 16.61.0.7539
